Source code for orinoco.exceptions

from typing import Optional



[docs]class BaseActionException(Exception):
    def __init__(self, message: str = "", reason: Optional[str] = None, action: Optional[object] = None):
        super().__init__(message)
        self.reason = reason
        self.action = action
        self.message = message

    def __str__(self) -> str:
        if self.reason is not None and self.action is not None:
            return "{}: {}: {}: {}".format(
                self.__class__.__name__, self.action.__class__.__name__, self.reason, self.message
            )
        return "{}: {}".format(self.__class__.__name__, self.message)




[docs]class ConditionNotMet(BaseActionException):
    pass




[docs]class NoneOfActionsCanBeExecuted(BaseActionException):
    pass




[docs]class NotAuthorizedCaller(BaseActionException):
    pass




[docs]class KeyNotInActionData(BaseActionException):
    pass




[docs]class ActionNotReturnedActionData(BaseActionException):
    pass




[docs]class ActionNotProperlyInherited(RuntimeError):
    pass




[docs]class ActionNotProperlyConfigured(RuntimeError):
    pass

    pass
